meanings.definition: Situated or occurring between the ribs.
meanings.sent1: The intercostals space felt tight after the injury.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pointed out the intercostals area on the X-ray.
meanings.sent3: The intercostals view of the sunset from the hill was breathtaking.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the intercostals silence of the library.
meanings.sent5: The intercostals shadows of the trees danced in the moonlight.

meanings.sent1: He felt a strain in his intercostals while lifting weights.
meanings.sent2: The intercostals help with breathing and stabilizing the chest.
meanings.sent3: The intercostals flexed proudly during the fitness competition.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the intercostals, strong and supportive.
meanings.sent5: The intercostals contracted smoothly during the yoga session.
